title.text: Yandex School of Data Analysis machine translation systems for WMT13

entities.text: Yandex School of Data Analysis machine translation

abstractContent.text: This paper describes the English-Russian and Russian-English statistical machine translation (SMT) systems developed at Yandex School of Data Analysis for the shared translation task of the ACL 2013 Eighth Workshop on Statistical Machine Translation.

entities.text: shared translation task of the ACL 2013 Eighth Workshop on Statistical Machine Translation

abstractContent.text: We adopted phrase-based SMT approach and evaluated a number of different techniques, including data filtering , spelling correction, alignment of lemmatized word forms and translitera-tion.
Altogether they yielded +2.0 and +1.5 BLEU improvement for ru-en and en-ru language pairs.
We also report on the experiments that did not have any positive effect and provide an analysis of the problems we encountered during the development of our systems.

introductionContent.text: We participated in the shared translation task of the ACL 2013 Workshop on Statistical Machine Translation (WMT13) for ru-en and en-ru language pairs.

entities.text: shared translation task of the ACL 2013 Workshop on Statistical Machine Translation (WMT13)

introductionContent.text: We provide a detailed description of the experiments carried out for the development of our systems.
The rest of the paper is organized as follows.
Section 2 describes the tools and data we used.
Our Russian→English and English→Russian setups are discussed in Section 3.
In Section 4 we report on the experiments that did not have any positive effect despite our expectations.
We provide a thorough analysis of erroneous outputs in Section 5 and draw conclusions in Section 6.
